g.text: Starts the process of viewing/searching the product's catalog
["User can view/search the catalog for a subjective amount of times"]
asks ahead for the filter that will be used to filter the catalog
typedQuery = query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.category.alphaNumericCode = :keyCategory", Product.class)
typedQuery = query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.shortDescription.description LIKE '%:keyDescription%' OR
typedQuery = query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.brand.name = :keyBrand",Product.class)
typedQuery = query("SELECT p FROM Product p ORDER BY p.price.priceWithTaxes :keyOrder",Product.class)
typedQuery = query("SELECT p FROM Product p where p.internalCode = :keyCode",Product.class)
typedQuery = query("SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.barcode.data = :keyCode", Product.class)
asks if user wishes to apply another filter or get full attributes from a displayed product
asks if user wishes to see product's images
asks if user wishes to keep searching the catalog or exit
